title: Leopard Vision: vol.1 (2015)
overview: A journey into the very depths of the belly of the most influential and insidious organization in existence. See, as never before, how the Papacy plays a vital role in current events, and the final fulfillment of Bible prophecy.
storyline: A historical journey which explain the cryptic beasts in the book of revelation in the bible and explains what significance they have to the current times. Well researched and excitingly put together the documentary answers some of the toughest questions which have troubled bible readers throughout the ages that is what exactly do the prophecies of revelation mean and how are they relevant to modern times.
